original_text: Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
korean_text: 내가 교회의 일꾼 된 것은 하나님이 너희를 위하여 내게 주신 직분을 따라 하나님의 말씀을 이루려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: Whereof I am made a minister
according to the dispensation of God
which is given to me for you
to fulfil the word of God
